about_the_game:
Be the talk of the town with this special Perry skin from Super Army of Tentacles 3, which is totally a game that is coming out soon! If it's not already a COMING SOON page on Steam, it will be shortly!

TO WEAR:

Post prologue, go back to the Hollycraft House to put this new skin on. Like a serial killer.

You'll be able to tell your friends that you were the new Perry character image before it was cool!
